item.title: Is this code wrong?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

ok i made a better ::nick command so you can change another players name

and is this wrong?


else if (command.startsWith("pnick") && playerRights >= 3) {
	if (command.substring(6).length() == 1){
	String otherPName = command.substring(6);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(7);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 2) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,7);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(8);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 3) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,8);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(9);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 4) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,9);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(10);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 5) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,10);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(11);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 6) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,11);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(12);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 7) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,11);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(12);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 8) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,12);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(13);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 9) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,13);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(14);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 10) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,14);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(15);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 11) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,15);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(16);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
	else if (command.substring(6).length() == 12) {
	String otherPName = command.substring(6,16);
	String newtempNick = command.substring(17);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.playerName = newtempNick;
			p.updateRequired = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	}
		
}

for me it looks right
